text: Jean Collet (3 March 1932 – 11 November 2020) was a French writer, cinematic theorist, and university professor. Collet worked as a journalist for Télérama from 1959 to 1971 and at Cahiers du Cinéma from 1961 to 1968. In 1965, he began working as a movie critic for Études. Collet wrote many books on cinema. Most of his written works were about Jean-Luc Godard published by Éditions Seghers. He was a professor at the Paris Descartes University, the Centre Sèvres, and the Institut national de l'audiovisuel. Collet died on 11 November 2020 at the age of 88 years old. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French journalists Category:Academics of Paris universities Category:French critics Category:Writers from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:People from Pau, France
title: Jean Collet
